PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_SensorPHistory
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties for history of controller values. HISTORY: Added in IFC4.

PropertyDef.Name: Direction
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates sensed direction for sensors capturing magnitude and direction measured from True North (0 degrees) in a clockwise direction.

PropertyDef.Name: Quality
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the quality of measurement or failure condition, which may be further qualified by the Status. True: measured values are considered reliable; False: measured values are considered not reliable (i.e. a fault has been detected); Unknown: reliability of values is uncertain.

PropertyDef.Name: Status
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates an error code or identifier, whose meaning is specific to the particular automation system. Example values include: 'ConfigurationError', 'NotConnected', 'DeviceFailure', 'SensorFailure', 'LastKnown, 'CommunicationsFailure', 'OutOfService'.

PropertyDef.Name: Value
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates sensed values over time which may be recorded continuously or only when changed beyond a particular deadband. The range of possible values is defined by the SetPoint property of the corresponding sensor type property set.
